titleStmt.title: The lavvfulnesse of our expedition into England manifested
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, first in Scotland, by Robert Bryson, and now reprinted in England, by Margery Mar-Prelat [i.e. Amsterdam, at the Cloppenburg Press],

notesStmt.note: A publication of the Scottish invaders.
The imprint is false; printed in Amsterdam at the Cloppenburg Press (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy spliced at end.
